backend/main.mo: Main actor for the ICP backend implementing product CRUD, business info management, user profiles, and AI prompt history, with role-based access control for admin and user operations.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that upgrades actor state from an older schema (without AI prompt history) to a new schema by adding an empty `aiPromptHistory` map.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features (photo editor UI, editing tools, layer management, AI editing panel) to their corresponding source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Auto-generated JSON document containing one-line summaries of all frontend source files, describing their purpose and any notable fixes applied.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS stylesheet defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark themes, including colors for background, foreground, sidebar, charts, and UI components.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the BAJARANGI ENTERPRISES app with SEO meta tags, Open Graph social sharing tags, favicon, and the React root mount point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that sets up TanStack Router with all application routes (home, products, admin, editor), wraps the app in AuthProvider and ThemeProvider, and renders a shared Layout with Header/Footer.
frontend/src/components/ConfirmDialog.ts: Reusable AlertDialog component that prompts the user to confirm or cancel a destructive action, accepting title, message, and callback props.
frontend/src/components/editor/AIEditPan: Panel that accepts a natural-language prompt, parses it into a transformation descriptor via a local utility, applies it to the canvas, and persists the prompt history to the backend.
frontend/src/components/editor/CanvasWor: Canvas component that handles mouse/touch interactions for draw, crop, and shape tools, rendering a semi-transparent crop overlay with rule-of-thirds grid lines on a secondary overlay canvas.
frontend/src/components/editor/EditorToo: Top header toolbar component with upload, undo, redo, and download actions, including a hidden file input for image uploads and tooltip-wrapped buttons.
frontend/src/components/editor/LayersPan: Displays a draggable list of canvas layers (text, shape, draw) with visibility toggle, delete, and reorder support via drag-and-drop.
frontend/src/components/editor/Propertie: Right-side panel that renders the appropriate tool settings component (filters, draw, text, shape, crop, resize, layers, AI edit) based on the active tool.
frontend/src/components/editor/tools/Cro: Properties panel UI for the crop tool, showing the selected crop region's coordinates and dimensions with apply and cancel buttons.
frontend/src/components/editor/tools/Dra: Brush settings panel with a size slider, preset and custom color pickers, and a live preview circle reflecting current brush size and color.
frontend/src/components/editor/tools/Fil: Filter adjustment panel with sliders for brightness, contrast, saturation, blur, grayscale, sepia, hue rotation, and opacity, plus per-filter and global reset buttons.
frontend/src/components/editor/tools/Res: A React component that provides canvas resizing controls, including width/height inputs, an aspect ratio lock toggle, preset size buttons (HD, FHD, Square, etc.), and an apply button.
frontend/src/components/editor/tools/Sha: A React component for configuring shape drawing settings, allowing users to select shape type (rectangle, circle, line, arrow), stroke width, stroke color, and fill color.
frontend/src/components/editor/tools/Tex: A React component for configuring text tool settings including content, font family, font size, bold/italic toggles, text alignment, and color selection.
frontend/src/components/editor/ToolsPane: Left-side vertical icon toolbar listing all available editor tools (select, crop, draw, text, shape, filter, resize, layers, AI edit) with tooltip labels.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer for BAJARANGI ENTERPRISES with a three-column layout containing branding, quick navigation links, and social media icons, plus a copyright line with a caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky top navigation header with logo, nav links (including Photo Editor), auth-aware login/logout and admin buttons, and a responsive mobile hamburger menu.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Card component displaying a product's image, name, price, and short description with buttons to call-to-order via phone or navigate to the product detail page.
frontend/src/components/ProductFormModal: Modal dialog form for creating or editing a product, with fields for name, price, descriptions, and image URL, wired to add/update mutation hooks.
frontend/src/contexts/AuthContext.tsx: Provides an authentication context using Internet Identity, exposing login/logout functions, authentication state, and admin status checked via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A custom hook that creates and caches a backend actor instance using the user's Internet Identity, initializing access control and invalidating dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAIPrompts.ts: Custom hooks for fetching all AI prompt history entries and saving new ones to the backend, using React Query for caching and mutation management.
frontend/src/hooks/useCanvasEditor.ts: A comprehensive custom hook managing canvas editor state including image data, drawing elements, filters, undo/redo history, tool settings, and canvas operations like upload, crop, and resize.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication on the ICP platform, managing login/logout state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines TanStack Query hooks for CRUD operations on products and business info, wrapping backend actor calls with loading states and toast notifications.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS stylesheet defining an agricultural green OKLCH color theme with light/dark mode CSS variables and custom utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that mounts the root component wrapped with TanStack QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/About.tsx: Public About page that displays business info fetched from the backend alongside static 'Why Choose Us' feature cards with icons.
frontend/src/pages/AdminBusinessInfo.tsx: Admin-only page with a form to view and update business contact details and about text, redirecting unauthenticated or non-admin users to the home page.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin-only dashboard page showing navigation cards to the product management and business info sections, with access guard redirecting unauthorized users.
frontend/src/pages/AdminProducts.tsx: Admin page for managing the product catalog, allowing authenticated admins to view, add, edit, and delete products via a table UI with a form modal and confirm dialog.
frontend/src/pages/Contact.tsx: Contact page displaying business phone, email, and address info fetched from the API, along with a simple contact form that shows a success toast on submission.
frontend/src/pages/Editor.tsx: Image editor page that composes toolbar, tools panel, canvas workspace, and properties panel components, wiring them to the useCanvasEditor hook and adding keyboard shortcuts for undo/redo/delete.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Landing page with a hero banner, business name and tagline from the API, a 'View Products' CTA button, and a three-feature highlights section.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetail.tsx: Detail page for a single product showing its image, price, and full description, with a 'Click to Call & Order' button that dials the business phone number.
frontend/src/pages/Products.tsx: Products listing page that fetches and displays all products in a responsive grid of ProductCard components, with a hero banner and empty/loading states.
frontend/src/types/editor.ts: Defines all TypeScript types and interfaces for the photo editor, including tool types, canvas elements (text, shape, draw), filter state, crop region, history entries, tool settings, and transformation descriptors.
frontend/src/utils/canvasOperations.ts: Provides canvas utility functions for applying CSS filters to a canvas, building filter strings from FilterState, and rendering canvas elements (text, shapes, freehand drawings).
frontend/src/utils/promptParser.ts: Parses natural language prompt strings into structured transformation descriptors, mapping keywords to filter changes (brightness, contrast, blur, etc.) and overlay effects (vignette, color tint, gradient).
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with helpers for persisting values to sessionStorage and cleaning sensitive params from the URL.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with dark mode support, custom OKLCH-based color tokens (including sidebar, chart, and agricultural-green themes), custom border radii, fonts, and animation keyframes, plus typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks the overall project state (version 3) for a Canva-like photo editor app, listing implemented features, architectural notes, image requirements, and known issues.
